comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historical Gardens, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 45239423@N08
comment._content: This picture is beautiful! Not something anyone would ever see in the modern world!!

comment.author: 10603986@N05
comment._content:
one big mistake, this ruin is not in Haarlem but in Santpoort .
I've lived nearby for 45 years

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Thanks for catching this error, Kaleidoscoop. Our title comes from the Detroit Publishing Co. but Brederode Castle does indeed appear to be in Santpoort. We will make a correction to our record next time we update.

comment.author: 10603986@N05
comment._content:
Well the text on the card sais Haarlem so how could you know?
In the time this card was made this part of Santpoort was called "buurtschap Jan Gijzen".
Since 1957 it is known as Santpoort Zuid
